description:
Lectures --- Ports are the gateways of goods for export and import. They are looking for ways to enhance efficiency and competitiveness --- containerization, key port processes, operation strategies, and port connectivity.

Seminars --- academics and practitioners will give seminars on emerging technology, port digitalization, ICT innovations with the highest impact on port.

The course coordinator will decide on the proporation of lectures and seminars.
title: Port Logistics and Supply Chain
